com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.util
Interface Progress

All Known Implementing Classes:
DummyProgress, ProgressDialog
public interface Progress

Interface for objects that monitor progress

Version:
$Id: Progress.java,v 1.2 2006/07/06 06:58:34 martin Exp $
Author:
martin

Method Summary
 void progressComplete(java.lang.String info)
          Called when an operation has completed
 void progressStall(java.lang.String reason)
          Called if progress has halted for some time
 void progressStart(int steps, java.lang.String info)
          Called when a operation is about to start to set up ready to display progress info
 void progressStep(int step)
          Called when progress has been made to update the display
 

Method Detail

progressStart

void progressStart(int steps,
                   java.lang.String info)
Called when a operation is about to start to set up ready to display progress info

Parameters:
steps - The total number of steps that there will be in this operation
info - A string describing the operation

progressStall

void progressStall(java.lang.String reason)
Called if progress has halted for some time

Parameters:
reason - A string describing the reason that no progress is occurring

progressStep

void progressStep(int step)
Called when progress has been made to update the display

Parameters:
step - The current step number that we have reached. This will range from 0 to one less than the number of steps that exist for this operation.

progressComplete

void progressComplete(java.lang.String info)
Called when an operation has completed

Parameters:
info - A string describing the status of the operation
